## TimeSpan.add() method

Returns a new TimeSpan object whose value is the sum of the specified TimeSpan object and this instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add(ts: TimeSpan): TimeSpan;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ts | TimeSpan | The time interval to add. |

<b>Returns:</b>

TimeSpan

TimeSpan - A new object that represents the value of this instance plus the value of ts.
